name: typescript-starter
description: A starter project for TypeScript libraries

scripts.compile: find src test tools typings -name "*.ts" | xargs tsc --declaration --module commonjs --target es5 --noImplicitAny --outDir build
scripts.lint: find src test tools -name "*.ts" | sed 's/^/--file=/g' | xargs tslint --rules-dir build/tools/rules

author: Asana
